0.user_question: Ray had 24334553 lollipops. He kept 4334553 lollipops and shared the remaining equally with his four friends. How many lollipops did each of his friends receive?

ost_step.3: Subtract these from the initial amount: 24334553 - 4334553 = 19999999 lollipops. These remain to be distributed among his four friends.

direct_answer.text: Firstly we subtract the count of lollipops which ray saved i.e., 4334553 from the original quantity i.e., 24334553. This leaves us with 24334553 – 4334553=19999999 lollipops. We divide this evenly amongst his four close companions (friends). Each friend hence gets one fourth of them; thus it becomes 1/4th*19999999=4999999.75 ~  4999999 since you cannot share partial lollips. Therefore, every single pal ends up having approximately 4999999 lollipops.
